title: Frankie Masala Powder | Homemade
content:
Powder Recipe: Frankie Masala Frankie Masala Powder is easy to make, homemade recipes are delicious and hygiene. It is used to spread on Kathi roll along with paneer, vegetable masala mix and also you can sprinkle on any chat. Letâ€™s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Red chilly powder - 1 1/2 Tbsp
  • Cumin Powder- 1 Tbsp
  • Amchur / dry mango powder - 1 1/2 Tbsp
  • Garam masala powder - 1 Tbsp
  • Coriander Powder - 1 Tbsp
  • Turmeric Powder - 1/4 tsp
  • Salt - 2 tsp ( you can also use black salt )
Procedure:
  • Take all ingredients in a bowl or plate
  • Combine well and store in an airtight container to remain fresh
  • Frankie Masala is ready to serve on Kathi roll or Veggie Frankie
  • Happy Cooking ðŸ˜ƒ Enjoy your day
